DOC.detailed_description: Kallmann syndrome comprise idiopathic hypogonadotropic hypogonadism anosmia ( inability smell ) . Associated phenotype may include cryptorchidism , microphallus , bone deformation , mirror movement , hear loss infertility . Objective characterize epidemiology , clinical genetic feature Kallmann syndrome Finland .
